name: personal-blog-server
description: The node server for my personal blog
author: Ungureanu Adrian Bogdan

scripts.minio:start: docker run -d -p 9000:9000 -p 9001:9001 --name minio -e MINIO_ROOT_USER=minioadmin -e MINIO_ROOT_PASSWORD=minioadmin -v minio_data:/data quay.io/minio/minio server /data --console-address :9001
scripts.dev:start: npm run minio:start && npm run start
